channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former NFL star Mick Luckhurst lists sporty Santa Barbara spread for $6 million
item.description: The 6-bedroom, 8-bath home comes with an array of sports facilities for football, soccer, basketball, golf, rock climbing, swimming, tennis, volleybal...

item.title: Sudden acceleration, not a bubble, is the AI story that investors are missing, says this top researcher
item.description: A blog post by a prominent AI researcher says those worried about an AI bubble, should be thinking about widespread integration by next year instead.

item.title: ‘Gold is like the art market,’ declares Citi, as it hikes its target price again.
item.description: Citi hike their target prices for gold and silver to $4000/oz and $55/oz respectively.

item.title: I’m 44. I have $400K in cash, plus rental properties in Dubai. I’m worried about a stock-market crash. Do I dare invest?
item.description: “My rental properties generate passive income of $6,000 monthly after taxes.”

item.title: Why Gundlach says it’s a very unusual market — and what bonds he likes now
item.description: The so-called bond king says local currency emerging-markets bonds are the place to be, at least for those willing to take on risk.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
